description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-the-latest-event-for-an-issue/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-the-latest-event-for-an-issue/)

Retrieves the details of the latest event for an issue.

### Path Parameters

`issue_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The ID of the issue.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `event:read`
